alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 10:53AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central San Diego County through 1130 AM PDT... At 1053 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Logan Heights, or over Downtown San Diego, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chula Vista, El Cajon, National City, La Mesa, Coronado, North Park, Downtown San Diego, Hillcrest, Lemon Grove, South Park, La Presa, Bonita, Mountain View, Encanto, Paradise Hills, East Village, Lincoln Park, Logan Heights, Spring Valley and Rolando. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys
